title: No Calls / Texts
content:
Intermittently, I won't receive calls or texts. When people try to call, it doesn't ring or go to voicemail.

It has recently started behaving this way. I think for the last month or so. 

I'm on the Freedom Mobile service, in Canada. I wondered if it was maybe a service issue, but my wife doesn't experience this on her iPhone. 

Any suggestions?

Done to date: turned off automatically select network, reset airplane mode, turned roaming on, reset phone completely.

I will randomly get a flood of texts at 2AM, or other odd times.
